Zorbitz

About Us

Zorbitz is a mother-daughter company started in 2003 with $100 and a one-bedroom apartment. Now they sell their products across the USA and around the world and give back to charities worldwide. So many amazing people have helped guide us on our journey and now we have helped guide others on their own journeys. We hope our story encourages others to do what they love.


Our Mission

Our goal is to give back and share that same feeling we experienced.
Through Zorbitz, we have been able to make a difference in this world. Thus far, we have contributed thousands of dollars annually to charities worldwide. We thank you for helping us make that difference.
